messages.title: Stronger for Scotland
messages.content: In the past two years the SNP has been the only effective opposition in Westminster and we'll be needed more than ever after this election. Give me your trust and your support once again and send me back to Parliament. Give me your votes and let me work every day to deliver a better life for us now and a better future for our children.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Guard the NHS against being privatised in any trade deal with the US.
Protect pensioners when the Tory government tries to cut pensions.

issues.governance: Austerity doesn’t work and it’s damaging our society; it’s being driven by a cold and uncaring government.
issues.socialWelfare: The callous treatment meted out to people who are disadvantaged, poor or disabled is horrible. Working parents stand in a food bank queue, disabled people are being denied the help they need. Bad policies and vindictive actions have pushed people into poverty.

politicalExperience.achievements: the SNP has been the only effective opposition in Westminster

leaflet.additionalNotes: Theresa May and her ministers want to end the triple lock that protects pensions and cut bereavement help.
